Description: model type of the first Interbotix Arm such as 'wx200' or 'rx150'
arbitrary name that is unique to the first robot arm
name of the 'root' link on the arm; typically 'base_link', but can be changed if attaching the arm to a mobile base that already has a 'base_link' frame
the file path to the 'mode config' YAML file for the first robot
model type of the second Interbotix Arm such as 'wx200' or 'rx150'
arbitrary name that is unique to the second robot arm
name of the 'root' link on the arm; typically 'base_link', but can be changed if attaching the arm to a mobile base that already has a 'base_link' frame
the file path to the 'mode config' YAML file for the second robot
if true, the Dynamixel simulator node is run; use RViz to visualize the robot's motion; if false, the real Dynamixel driver node is run
launches RViz to show both arms
file path to the config file RViz should load
